title: Three.js Official Documentation

title: WebGL API Reference

title: WCAG 2.1 Accessibility Guidelines

content: Mozilla Developer Network guide for implementing Content Security Policy headers to prevent XSS attacks while allowing necessary external resources.

title: RequestAnimationFrame API

title: Speech Synthesis API
content: Web Speech API documentation for implementing screen reader announcements and audio accessibility features.

title: Three.js BufferGeometry Guide
content: Three.js documentation for efficient geometry creation and management, used to optimize 3D rendering performance and memory usage.

title: ES6 Classes and Modules

title: Traditional Tetris Scoring System
content: Classic Tetris scoring mechanics and level progression rules, implemented to maintain familiarity with traditional Tetris gameplay.

title: Device Memory API
content: Web API for detecting device memory capabilities, used in browser compatibility checks to optimize game settings for different hardware.

title: Three.js Shadow Mapping

title: Gamepad API Specification
content: W3C specification for gamepad input detection, included in browser compatibility checks for potential future controller support.

title: 3D Browser Games Design Patterns
